title: Bravura (Malibu Imprint) by request
description:
Bravura was an artist owned Malibu imprint active during 1994 and 1995.  This torrent collects scans of all Bravura books known to be available as of the torrent posting date.  Additionally there is prequel and sequel material where available except for Nocturnals and Dreadstar which are well represented in other torrents.  The torrent is in response to a request made at [url=http://www.comicsearch.co.uk]comicsearch.co.uk[/url].  There&#039;s a spreadsheet summarizing Bravura in Excel and OpenOffice format and cover images of most of the missing titles.

You can read more about Malibu and Bravura at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malibu_Comics and by following the links you will find there.

Thank you to the Artists, Writers, Publishers, Scanners and Distributors who made this compilaiton possible.
